testcase.name: add a User with valid details
testcase.system-out: Given the Admin User is registered with the bank............................passed And has access for adding new User..........................................passed When the Admin User provides details like firstname as "SS5", lastname as "SS5" and department as "finance".passed Then a User is created......................................................passed And a message saying "User successfully created" is provided................passed

testcase.name: add a User with invalid details
testcase.system-out: Given the Admin User is registered with the bank............................passed And has access for adding new User..........................................passed When the Admin User provides details like firstname as "SS5", lastname as "null" and department as "HR".passed Then an error message saying "Missing details" is provided..................passed
